portingItems.title: Supercharger
portingItems.desc: Improves airflow and boost efficiency. Gains of 20–40+ WHP are common when paired with tuning.

portingItems.title: Bearing Plate

portingItems.title: Snout

portingItems.title: Whipple
portingItems.desc: Precision Whipple porting can dramatically increase airflow and power, especially in high-boost setups.

portingItems.title: Throttle Body
portingItems.desc: Port-matched throttle bodies reduce intake restriction and improve throttle response and power delivery.

portingItems.title: Cylinder Head
portingItems.desc: Full porting improves combustion efficiency, flow, and performance — essential for high-RPM and boosted builds.

portingItems.title: Intake Manifold
portingItems.desc: A ported intake manifold optimizes air distribution to each cylinder, supporting high-HP goals with better balance.

methodology.title: Methodology
items: Baseline measurement and inspection; document casting lines and restrictions.
CNC rough-in to targeted CSA; hand-blend for surface finish and transition quality.
Port-matching across interfaces (snout ⇄ TB ⇄ case ⇄ manifold).
Final inspection: CSA verification, concentricity, fastener land integrity.
deliverables: Recommended TB size / injector / belt guidance where applicable.
Gasket surfaces protected; threads chased; components cleaned and bagged.
Optional polish or ceramic coat on request.

summaryCards.title: Typical Gains
summaryCards.body: Supercharger/snout pairs commonly see +20–40 WHP with proper tuning and supporting mods. Cylinder head & intake work supports higher RPM power retention.

summaryCards.title: Turnaround
summaryCards.body: Most jobs 5–10 business days after parts are received. Expedited options available.

summaryCards.title: Compatibility
summaryCards.body: Hellcat/Redeye/Demon, Trackhawk/Durango, HEMI 5.7/6.1/6.4, Whipple & other positive displacement blowers. Ask about other platforms.
